alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 5:11AM AKDT until March 30 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting to 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills north of Shaktoolik. * WHEN...From noon today to noon AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds will increase across the area this morning. Snow and blowing snow with low visibility will develop north of Shaktoolik this afternoon. Winds will decrease tonight and snow will spread to the remainder of the area from Shaktoolik south tonight. The heaviest snow will be north of Shaktoolik. Areas from Shaktoolik south will see 2 to 3 inches of snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
